name: MPSRNNBidirectionalCombineMode
desc: Modes that define how two images or matrices are combined.

items.name: case add
items.desc: A mode in which two sequences are summed to form a single output.

items.name: case concatenate
items.desc: A mode in which two sequences are concatenated along the feature channels to form a single output.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A mode in which two sequences are kept separate.
